io.konik.zugferd.unqualified

Class Amount

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.konik.zugferd.unqualified.Amount

  • public class Amount
extends java.lang.Object

    The Monetary Amount.

    A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.
